example.text: Although imports account for less than 1% of beer sales in Japan, Asahi Breweries Ltd., which has been gaining share with its popular dry beer, plans *trace* to fend off Japanese competitors by *trace* pouring $1.06 billion into facilities *trace* to brew 50% more beer.
